forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning wind and rain. High 14C. WSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning wind and rain. High 56F. WSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low around 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low around 10C. SE winds shifting to NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low around 50F. SE winds shifting to NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early then partly cloudy and windy later in the day. High 53F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low 48F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. SSE winds at 15 to 30 km/h, increasing to 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 53F. SSE winds at 10 to 20 mph, increasing to 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High near 15C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 58F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, with mostly sunny and windy conditions later in the day. High 12C. Winds WNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 52F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High near 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
